action.des: Adam Fox remains in the game as the designated hitter.

atbat.des: Mike Jacobs flies out to right fielder Steven Murphy.
Miguel Olivo pops out to first baseman Chris Davis in foul territory.
Alex Gordon flies out to left fielder David Murphy.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: Brian Buchanan replaces first baseman Mike Jacobs, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: John Buck replaces catcher Miguel Olivo, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Irving Falu replaces third baseman Alex Gordon, batting 6th, playing second base.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Alberto Callaspo.

atbat.des: Chris Davis singles on a line drive to center fielder Mitch Maier.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds into double play, third baseman Alberto Callaspo to second baseman Irving Falu to first baseman Brian Buchanan. Chris Davis out at 2nd.
Elvis Andrus lines out to second baseman Irving Falu.
